installation.name: TinyMCE Cloud API Key
installation.description: Insert your TinyMCE Cloud API key here

installation.name: TinyMCE Cloud 'channel' to use
installation.description: Insert your TinyMCE Cloud channel here

instance.name: Plugins
instance.description: Space-separated list of TinyMCE plugins to enable. See https://www.tiny.cloud/docs/plugins/ for more information on plugins.
instance.default: wordcount spellchecker paste hr help searchreplace insertdatetime autoresize lists advlist media image imagetools table charmap link autolink anchor code codesample

instance.name: Toolbar 1
instance.description: Specify your upper toolbar configuration here. To use the default toolbar, clear this field. To hide the toolbar, enter the value 'false'. See https://www.tiny.cloud/docs/configure/editor-appearance/#toolbar
instance.default: fontselect | forecolor backcolor | bold italic underline | alignleft aligncenter alignright alignjustify | outdent indent

instance.name: Toolbar 2
instance.description: Specify your second toolbar configuration here. To use the default toolbar, clear this field. To hide the toolbar, enter the value 'false'. See https://www.tiny.cloud/docs/configure/editor-appearance/#toolbar
instance.default: formatselect | link anchor | image media | table insertdatetime | code hr | numlist bullist

instance.name: Menubar
instance.description: Specify the menus to display here. To use the default menu bar, clear this field. To hide the menu, enter the value 'false'. See https://www.tiny.cloud/docs/configure/editor-appearance/#menubar
instance.default: edit format insert view table tools help
